title: Workplace-Based Simulation Training to Strengthen Nursing Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Short VR simulation-based course designed for practicing nurses to acquire advanced clinical skills in real workplace settings, with instructional design considering limited tech environments (smartphone-centric).

learning_goals: Learners can analyze high-risk patient cases through VR simulations and apply appropriate nursing interventions with over 80% accuracy
Learners strengthen collaborative competencies by practicing interdisciplinary team communication five or more times in simulation environments resembling real workplace settings
Learners can self-diagnose comprehensive health assessment skills and develop improvement plans through simulation evaluation tools utilizing mobile devices

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
